forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun retreats beyond the horizon, Downtown San Francisco finds itself cloaked in a delicate veil of partially cloudy skies, the air tinged with the cool comfort of a mild evening. The temperature hovers around 53 degrees, with gentle winds from the west southwest stirring at 9 to 17 mph, occasionally picking up strength like playful whispers through the trees. Fleeting glimpses of pastel hues dance in the lingering daylight, suggesting a gradual transition to the serene embrace of night.

Looking ahead to Tuesday, a canvas of mostly sunny skies promises warmth, though the early delights of a high near 64 will begin to wane by afternoon. The winds may continue to tease the air, gusting up to 23 mph. There remains a hint of the marine layer—an ever-present character in this coastal city—softening the sharp outlines of the skyline, and inviting thoughts of an adventure in the nearby parks or perhaps a leisurely stroll along the waterfront. As the evening nears, dressing in a light layer will suffice, ready for the cooler embrace of dusk, while those inspired by the weather may consider an unhurried exploration of the vibrant local eateries or a quiet moment on a terrace to enjoy the fading light.
